EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Archer_Registration_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your registration request with Cummins
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering with Cummins. Your registration as {!Contact.IAM_Cummins_login_ID__c} has been successfully submitted. Once processed, you will receive an email with further instructions to complete your account setup. A Cummins representative may contact you to confirm or request additional information about your registration. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINS or your Cummins account representative. Sincerely, Cummins Support This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
